atsFormatting.title: ATS Formatting Guide
atsFormatting.subtitle: Learn how to optimize your CV for Applicant Tracking Systems to increase your chances of getting noticed by recruiters.

whatIsAts.title: What is Resume Parsing?
whatIsAts.description1: Resume/CV parsing is an important feature of many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS). The ability to parse resumes allows for the automatic extraction, storage, and analysis of resume data.
whatIsAts.description2: The system helps candidates populate application fields automatically and assists recruiters in identifying potential job matches. Companies use parsed data primarily to help applicants complete applications and suggest relevant positions.

proTip.title: Pro Tip
proTip.description: Many professionals maintain two versions of their CV: one optimized for ATS parsing and another with enhanced visual design for direct human review.

elementsToAvoid.title: Elements to Avoid
elementsToAvoid.description: These formatting elements can confuse ATS systems and may cause your CV to be incorrectly parsed

acceptableElements.title: Acceptable Formatting Elements
acceptableElements.description: These formatting options are safe to use and will be correctly parsed by most ATS systems

items.italics: Italics for titles or subtle emphasis
items.colors: Colors (note: ATS will convert all text to the same color)

fileFormat.title: File Format
fileFormat.description: .docx format is the most accurately parsed by ATS systems
fileFormat.note: While PDFs preserve formatting better for human readers, .docx files are better for ATS parsing.

fonts.title: Font Selection
fonts.description: Stick to universal, professional fonts that ATS systems recognize:

scanningStrategy.title: Scanning Strategy
scanningStrategy.description: How ATS systems read your CV
scanningStrategy.intro: Like a human reader, ATS systems scan from left to right and top to bottom. Structure your CV to accommodate this reading pattern:

items.format: Use chronological or combination resume formats (avoid functional layouts)
items.contact: Place contact information at the top of the page
items.recent: List your most recent positions first

keywords.title: Keywords Matter
keywords.description: Strategic keyword placement is crucial for ATS success
keywords.intro: ATS systems search for specific keywords related to the job requirements. To optimize your CV:

items.skills: Include hard skills that match the job posting
items.attention: Pay special attention to keywords that appear multiple times in the job description
items.requirements: Focus on terms near the requirements section

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: Misspelling certain words and phrases could immediately disqualify your resume. Always proofread carefully, especially for technical terms and job-specific keywords.
